name: Air Resistance (itch)
description:
Made for the 1-Button Game Jam 2022
Use D, F, J, K, Enter, M, N, Z, Q, P, Space, Up-Arrow, Left-Click to play

You have valuable data... of some kind! And everyone wants it! Push back against the air resistance, boldly rush shoulder-first into your enemies to shoulder-bash them into the stratosphere, and don't let the world lose hope!

With such features as:

  • The ability to play with just 1 finger - D, F, J, K, Enter, M, N, Z, Q, P, Space, Up, and Left-Click all work!
  • A variety of enemy types - progressively harder, but with progressively more points to be won: everything from standard helicopters to tricky, sidestepping aliens.
  • The ability to shoulderbash all of those aircraft, and gain more points the harder you can send them flying!
  • A ground that never comes! Until you die, it's infinite falling time! Rack up as many points as you can!

Made in Godot by Nyzrfyrn, sound effects created using JFXR, "Agent" font from Daniil Toporou.
